text: Humberto Benítez Treviño (born 5 July 1945) is a Mexican lawyer and politician. He was Attorney General of México from 1994 to 1996. == References == Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Institutional Revolutionary Party politicians Category:Mexican Attorneys General Category:Mexican lawyers Category:Politicians from the State of Mexico Category:21st-century Mexican politicians
title: Humberto Benítez Treviño
